/*---------------------------------------------
Script Inicial de UP Lakehouse
-----------------------------------------------
Autor: Mauro A. Le칩n Payano
Fecha: 12/12/2022*/
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 1: Creacion de repositorio de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE DATABASE updatalakehouse;
GO

USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 2: Creacion de dataset por zona de datos
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA master_transaction AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_channel AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA master_party AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

CREATE SCHEMA business_knowa AUTHORIZATION dbo;
GO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Paso 3: Asignaci칩n de clave de encriptaci칩n y formato de tablas externas
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39248J#asdasdiu89yuj1k23sdd'
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPUserIdentity WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-06-30T14:26:24Z&st=2023-05-06T06:26:24Z&spr=https&sig=quzHL2%2FDhBqzd%2F4PxYZxb4gNOYOCG4JHq%2BoXNmzF9Pg%3D'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdsdjrcdev89o.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPUserIdentity
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPDeltaFileFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVWithHEADERFORMAT
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
);
GO

USE updatalakehouse;
GO

-- USERS--
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/users/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_users3(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50),
    DownVotes NVARCHAR(50),
    LastAccessDate NVARCHAR(50),
    Reputation NVARCHAR(50),
    UpVotes NVARCHAR(50),
    Views NVARCHAR(50),
    AccountId NVARCHAR(50),
    Email NVARCHAR(80)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/users/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_users3;
GO
-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_users_dim1 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_users_dim1/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_users3;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_users_dim1;

---- con delta ----
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_users_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_users_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_users3;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_users_delta;

-----------
-- BADGES--
-----------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/badges/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_badges1(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Name NVARCHAR(50),
    UserId NVARCHAR(50),
    Date NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/badges/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_badges1;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_badges_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_badges_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_badges1;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_badges_dim;

---- con delta ----
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_badges_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_badges_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_badges1;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_badges_delta;

--------------
-- COMMENTS --
--------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/comments/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_comments(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50),
    PostId NVARCHAR(50),
    Score NVARCHAR(50),
    UserId NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/comments/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_comments;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_comments_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_comments_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_comments;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_comments_dim;

---- con delta ----
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_comments_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_comments_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_comments;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_comments_delta;
---------------
-- LINKTYPES --
---------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/linktypes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_linktypes(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Type NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/linktypes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT * FROM master_party.dim_linktypes;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_linktypes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_linktypes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT * FROM master_party.dim_linktypes;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_linktypes_dim;

---- con delta ----
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_linktypes_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_linktypes_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_linktypes

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_linktypes_delta;

--------------
-- POSTLINKS--
--------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/postlinks/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_postlinks(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50),
    PostId NVARCHAR(50),
    RelatedPostId NVARCHAR(50),
    LinkTypeId NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/postlinks/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_postlinks;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_postlinks_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_postlinks_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_postlinks;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_postlinks_dim;

---- con delta ----
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_postlinks_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_postlinks_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_postlinks

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_postlinks_delta;

--------------
-- POSTTYPES--
--------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/posttypes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_posttypes1(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Type NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/posttypes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_posttypes1;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_posttypes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_posttypes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_posttypes1;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_posttypes_dim;

---- con delta ----
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_posttypes_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_posttypes_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_posttypes1

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_posttypes_delta;

-- VOTES --
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/votes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_votes(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    PostId NVARCHAR(50),
    UserId NVARCHAR(50),
    BountyAmount NVARCHAR(50),
    VoteTypeId NVARCHAR(50),
    CreationDate NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/votes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_votes;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_votes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_votes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_votes;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_votes_dim;

---- con delta ----
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_votes_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_votes_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_votes

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_votes_delta;
--------------
-- VOTETYPES--
--------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/raw/data/votetypes/*.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_votetypes(
    Id NVARCHAR(50),   
    Name NVARCHAR(50)
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/raw/data/votetypes/',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


SELECT TOP(10) * FROM master_party.dim_votetypes;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_votetypes_dim 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_votetypes_dim/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_votetypes;

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_votetypes_dim;

----- con delta 
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_votetypes_delta
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/business_knowa/bi_votetypes_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT TOP(100) * FROM master_party.dim_votetypes

SELECT * FROM business_knowa.bi_votetypes_delta;
